    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    ATPFactory
     
    ATPFactory.ATPPhaseInstance
     
    ATPPhase<T>
     
    ATPUnitTestHelper
    The class ATPUnitTestHelper is a helper class to provide access to internal methods of the ATP package for JUnit tests purposes.
    Element<T>
    An Element represents a node within a tree.
    HappyTree
    Helper class that provides the entry point of the HappyTree API.
    Id
    Represents the identifier of a tree node class.
    Parent
    Represents a reference to the parent identifier of an object in a tree model.
    Tree
    Declarative annotation to indicate that the object of a class represents a node in a tree structure.
    TreeException
    The class TreeException represents a checked exception for the HappyTree API by inheriting the Exception class.
    TreeManager
    Provides ways to handle elements within a tree session.
    TreePipeline
     
    TreeSession
    Interface responsible for storing element trees.
    TreeTransaction
    Dedicated interface to handle all stored tree sessions.
    TreeUnitTestHelper
    The class TreeUnitTestHelper is a helper class to provide access to internal methods of the core package for JUnit tests purposes.
